targets.expr: max_over_time({__name__='rec:node_cpu_usage:$type:1m'}[$interval]) and on (instance0) (max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:agent_mysql:snap:1m|rec:agent_linux:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) <= $read_only^2-3 or max_over_time({__name__='rec:mysql_readonly:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) == $read_only)

panels.description: Cpu Waits for I/O. Check disk or network status if this value is high. It could be from random I/O disk read pattern if your disk is not SSD.

targets.expr: max_over_time({__name__='rec:node_cpu_wait_usage:$type:1m', mode='iowait'}[$interval]) and on (instance0) (max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:agent_mysql:snap:1m|rec:agent_linux:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) <= $read_only^2-3 or max_over_time({__name__='rec:mysql_readonly:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) == $read_only)

panels.title: CPU Wait : I/O

panels.description: Cpu Waits for "USER". Application use cpu resource too much. This is mostly caused by inefficient query execution.

targets.expr: max_over_time({__name__='rec:node_cpu_wait_usage:$type:1m', mode='user'}[$interval]) and on (instance0) (max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:agent_mysql:snap:1m|rec:agent_linux:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) <= $read_only^2-3 or max_over_time({__name__='rec:mysql_readonly:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) == $read_only)

panels.title: CPU Waits : USER

targets.expr: max_over_time({__name__='rec:node_load_avg:$type:1m'}[$interval]) and on (instance0) (max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:agent_mysql:snap:1m|rec:agent_linux:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) <= $read_only^2-3 or max_over_time({__name__='rec:mysql_readonly:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) == $read_only)

max_over_time({__name__='rec:node_mem_usage:$type:1m'}[$interval]) and on (instance0) (max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:agent_mysql:snap:1m|rec:agent_linux:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) <= $read_only^2-3 or max_over_time({__name__='rec:mysql_readonly:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) == $read_only)

max_over_time({__name__='rec:node_mem_swap_byte:$type:1m'}[$interval]) and on (instance0) (max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:agent_mysql:snap:1m|rec:agent_linux:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) <= $read_only^2-3 or max_over_time({__name__='rec:mysql_readonly:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) == $read_only)

max_over_time({__name__='rec:node_mem_cached_pct:$type:1m'}[$interval]) and on (instance0) (max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:agent_mysql:snap:1m|rec:agent_linux:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) <= $read_only^2-3 or max_over_time({__name__='rec:mysql_readonly:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) == $read_only)

panels.description: Similar disk Utilization, but sum io times for each device's.

targets.expr: max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:node_disk_io_ms:$type:1m'}[$interval]) and on (instance0) (max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:agent_mysql:snap:1m|rec:agent_linux:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) <= $read_only^2-3 or max_over_time({__name__='rec:mysql_readonly:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) == $read_only)

panels.title: Disk Total IO Time

panels.description: Shows amount of physical IOs (reads and writes) Spikes in number of IOs served often corresponds to performance problems due to IO subsystem overload.

targets.expr: max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:node_disk_reads:$type:1m'}[$interval]) and on (instance0) (max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:agent_mysql:snap:1m|rec:agent_linux:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) <= $read_only^2-3 or max_over_time({__name__='rec:mysql_readonly:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) == $read_only)

panels.title: Disk Read Operations

panels.description: Shows amount of physical IOs (reads and writes) Spikes in number of IOs served often corresponds to performance problems due to IO subsystem overload.

targets.expr: max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:node_disk_writes:$type:1m'}[$interval]) and on (instance0) (max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:agent_mysql:snap:1m|rec:agent_linux:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) <= $read_only^2-3 or max_over_time({__name__='rec:mysql_readonly:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) == $read_only)

panels.title: Disk Write Operations

targets.expr: max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:node_disk_read_bytes:$type:1m'}[$interval]) and on (instance0) (max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:agent_mysql:snap:1m|rec:agent_linux:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) <= $read_only^2-3 or max_over_time({__name__='rec:mysql_readonly:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) == $read_only)

max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:node_disk_write_bytes:$type:1m'}[$interval]) and on (instance0) (max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:agent_mysql:snap:1m|rec:agent_linux:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) <= $read_only^2-3 or max_over_time({__name__='rec:mysql_readonly:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) == $read_only)

panels.description: Shows average latency for Reads and Writes IO Devices.  Higher than typical latency for highly loaded storage indicates saturation (overload) and is frequent cause of performance problems.  Higher than normal latency also can indicate internal storage problems.

targets.expr: max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:node_disk_read_latency:$type:1m'}[$interval]) and on (instance0) (max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:agent_mysql:snap:1m|rec:agent_linux:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) <= $read_only^2-3 or max_over_time({__name__='rec:mysql_readonly:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) == $read_only)

panels.title: Disk Read Latency

panels.description: Shows average latency for Reads and Writes IO Devices.  Higher than typical latency for highly loaded storage indicates saturation (overload) and is frequent cause of performance problems.  Higher than normal latency also can indicate internal storage problems.

targets.expr: max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:node_disk_write_latency:$type:1m'}[$interval]) and on (instance0) (max_over_time({__name__=~'rec:agent_mysql:snap:1m|rec:agent_linux:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) <= $read_only^2-3 or max_over_time({__name__='rec:mysql_readonly:snap:1m', instance=~'$host'}[$interval]) == $read_only)

panels.title: Disk Write Latency
